snippet: The group of American investment firms have provided an alternative plan, which includes a loan of 30 billion yen, or $380 million, to the Japanese chip maker Elpida to help during its restructuring period.
abstract: The group of American investment firms have provided an alternative plan, which includes a loan of 30 billion yen, or $380 million, to the Japanese chip maker Elpida to help during its restructuring period.

headline.main: Unimpressed by Micron's Offer, Elpida Bondholders Offer Alternative
